953020.name: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 - Anime Music Pack 2
953020.description:
Note that songs included are their respective abridged versions.

You must have the full retail version of the game to use this content. Additionally, you must be playing on the latest version of the game to access the content.

Spice up Conton City and in-game battles with this pack of songs from DRAGON BALL Z, DRAGON BALL Z Kai, and DRAGON BALL Super!

Songs included:
- CHOUZETSU☆DYNAMIC! by Kazuya Yoshii
- GENKAI TOPPA × SURVIVOR by Kiyoshi Hikawa
- YOKA YOKA DANCE by Batten Showjo Tai
- HERO ～Kibou no Uta～ by FLOW
- DRAGON SOUL by Takayoshi Tanimoto
- UNMEINO HI ～TAMASHII VS TAMASHII～ by Hironobu Kageyama
- KYUUKYOKUNO BATTLE (Instrumental)
- MOETSUKIRO!! NESSEN RESSEN CHOU GEKISEN BGM
- SHIO YOBU CELL GAME
- TENKA WAKEMENO CHOUKESSEN!!
- DRAGON BALL Z BGM
953020.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语*, 繁体中文, 韩语, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
